post_content: Dads House aims to make sure children remain the priority after divorce, separation or bereavement. We have been running Foodbanks for over 10 years and are very lucky to have a great partnership with Delancey and Earls Court Development, who provided us with premises in Lille Road, Fulham, SW6 1TS. Anyone supporting a family is welcome. We also run a pro bono family law clinics on Wednesdays and Fridays. A fully functioning law practice, Simon Bruce is our legal director and a partner at Dawson Cornwell. He is one of the best family law solicitors in the country.
cause_description: Dads House is a registered Charity and depends entirely on donationsEach week we are helping over 850 people who then feed their families, thanks to your contributions.We currently have one food bank and as well as delivering food to those that are vulnerable or shielding. Dads House in Royal Borough of Kensington and Chelsea (RBKC ) is open 7 days a week.We need funding for food, supplies, equipment and core funding for our paid staff members. (On London living wage)
service_2_description: Dads House provides a foodbank for families at Lille Road, Fulham, SW6 1TS. We're open Monday to Friday, 10am to 1pm, thanks to our partners at Delancey and Earls Court Development.
service_1_description: Dads House holds a weekly Family Law clinic offering practical and free legal advice, which is led by Simon Bruce. ‚ÄúOne of the best family lawyers in the country‚Äù Chambers NHW 2020
service_4_description: Dads House provides free health and blood testing for all families. The social setting allows fathers to discuss their concerns and get referrals to our Law Clinic if needed.
service_5_description: The Breakfast Club, running for 7 years, provides a mutual support network for dads, where all dietary needs are met. Dads House also offers a lunch club every Tuesday.

post_content: Sorana‚Äôs Strays ‚Äì Rescuing, Rehabilitating & RehomingAt Sorana‚Äôs Strays, we rescue and care for abandoned animals, giving them a second chance at a loving home. Through rehabilitation, vet care, and adoption, we work to ensure every pet finds the family they deserve.Support us by adopting, fostering, or donating‚Äîbecause every stray deserves a home. ‚ù§Ô∏èüêæ
cause_description:
Not ready to adopt? You can still change a life.
At Sorana‚Äôs Strays, we rescue, rehabilitate, and rehome abandoned animals‚Äîgiving them the second chance they truly deserve. Every donation helps cover vital vet care, food, shelter, and transport for these vulnerable pets as they await their forever homes.Your support keeps tails wagging, even if you can‚Äôt adopt.

post_content: An iconic pub with rooms in the heart of Wimbledon Village, the Dog & Fox offers a cozy and spacious environment for all. It's an ideal spot for a post-walk pint or a relaxing dinner with your dog by your side. With a focus on fresh, seasonal British ingredients, the pub serves everything from hearty breakfasts to mouthwatering Sunday roasts. They also have private event spaces and a selection of stunning boutique bedrooms, with some specifically designated as dog-friendly. Your furry friend wil

A warm and inviting pub in Wimbledon Village, The Fire Stables is a perfect spot for any occasion. The pub‚Äôs menu champions the best of British ingredients, with expertly crafted dishes from brunch to dinner. They also offer a wide selection of cocktails, wines, and craft beers. As a proudly dog-friendly establishment, they welcome four-legged companions with complimentary treats and fresh water, making it an ideal stop after a walk on Wimbledon Common.

A charming 17th-century pub with 13 comfortable rooms, the Rose & Crown is a short stroll from Wimbledon Common, making it the perfect post-walk destination for you and your dog. The pub is known for its hearty British pub classics, delicious Sunday roasts, and a welcoming team led by Landlady Nicky and the pub‚Äôs resident dog, Freddy. They offer dog-friendly accommodation, providing a special welcome with treats, a dog bed or blanket, and a water bowl for your canine companion.

A bustling community pub run by legendary landlords Mick and Sarah, The Alexandra prides itself on a super-welcoming vibe for everyone, including four-legged friends. They offer a great selection of beers, global wines, and a menu of pub classics made with fresh, locally-sourced British ingredients. The pub welcomes dogs on the ground floor and even provides treats at the bar, making it an ideal stop after a walk.

Pawpairs offers a boutique dog grooming service with a one-to-one approach  ensuring a personal and stress-free experience for your dog. Their services include puppy introductory grooms  wash and tidies  hand stripping  and nail clipping. They also offer a loyalty discount for regular customers.
Professional dog grooming services in South West London, offering a range of styling options.
Lively dog-friendly pub in Wimbledon Broadway, known for its craft beers, food, and live music.
Luxury pet boutique offering high-end pet food, accessories, and grooming services.

Laura's Little Lodgers offers home boarding for small dogs in London. She runs a very special home-from-home business with the aim of giving all of her little lodgers as much love and attention as they would receive at home. She is a council 5-star licensed provider.

post_title: Bed and Bone Home Dog Boarding
post_content: Bed and Bone provides a home-from-home dog boarding service in SW London. They offer a pick-up and drop-off chauffeur service for your convenience and ensure your dog has a great holiday in front of a fire after a walk on the beach or a woodland ramble. They are a council 5-star rated service.

A modern and stylish eatery in Wimbledon Village that focuses on a "hunter-gatherer" approach to cooking using seasonal and sustainably sourced British produce. They warmly welcome small well-behaved dogs in the front of the restaurant and ask that you mention this in the reservation notes.

A traditional pub located right next to Wimbledon Common. It‚Äôs the perfect pit-stop for walkers and their dogs. The pub offers a cozy interior with log fires in the winter and a spacious popular beer garden for warmer months. They serve classic pub food and a great selection of local ales.

A contemporary neighbourhood bar and restaurant located in the heart of Wimbledon. It offers a stylish interior and a standout feature: a large wrap-around first-floor roof terrace perfect for socializing. They warmly welcome well-behaved dogs especially on the spacious terrace making it a great destination for a post-walk treat.

A long-standing part of the Wimbledon community Stone Lion Veterinary Hospital has been providing expert veterinary care for over 100 years. They are a large well-equipped hospital offering 24-hour care surgical facilities and a comprehensive range of medical services.

Part of the well-respected Goddard Veterinary Group this branch in Wimbledon is dedicated to providing high-quality and compassionate healthcare for pets. They offer a wide range of services with a skilled and dedicated team focused on your animal's welfare.

Wimbledon Veterinary Surgery is a purpose-built hospital that provides high-quality veterinary care for all family pets. They offer a full range of veterinary services including check-ups diagnostics surgical facilities and emergency care. The practice has a reputation for being caring and pet-friendly.

Pets at Home Wimbledon is a premier destination for pet enthusiasts offering a comprehensive range of products and services under one roof. They stock an extensive selection of pet supplies including food toys grooming products and accessories for dogs cats birds and more.

Creature Company is a friendly local pet shop and grooming salon on Wimbledon's Broadway. They have been trading for over 16 years and offer a comprehensive range of food accessories and supplies for dogs cats small animals birds and even wildlife.

This service offers a unique approach to dog behaviour, with a focus on remote and video call consultations. The practitioner, Elaine Henley, helps dogs with a variety of issues, including reactivity towards other dogs, obsessive behaviour, and noise sensitivity. Her approach has proven to be highly effective for clients both locally and at a distance.

Ross McCarthy is a leading canine behaviourist and trainer with over 25 years of experience. His services are known for being high-end and effective, with a focus on specialist training, residential programs, and dog safety education. His refined expertise has helped hundreds of discerning clients and their loyal companions.

Zoe Willingham is a dog behaviourist who specializes in separation anxiety, aggression, and reactivity. She helps dog owners all over the UK with the challenges they face in dealing with their dog's behaviour. She offers a range of packages and tailored plans to suit the needs of each individual dog and owner.

Animal Behaviour Kent (ABK) provides expert behaviour support for aggression, reactivity, separation anxiety, and more. Their qualified and veterinary-recommended behaviourists focus solely on behaviour rehabilitation, not basic training. They offer structured, ongoing support with science-backed, ethical training methods.

Pawsitive Pups offers a range of services, including puppy training, obedience classes, and behavioural consultations. Their trainers use positive reinforcement to help dogs overcome issues like fear, anxiety, and aggression. They are a mobile service and serve the London area.

Holidays4Dogs is a home boarding service that connects dog owners with approved and checked carers in London and the M25 area. All carers are experienced, mature, reliable, and home-based dog lovers who provide a true home-from-home holiday for your dog.

Amy's Pet Services is a small team of dedicated, reliable, experienced, professional pet-sitters who offer solo dog-walking, live-in pet-sitting and visits for your pets in London and the Home Counties. They are DBS-checked and offer a fully insured service.

Your London Pet Sitter is an award-winning, family-run pet service provider with over 10 years of experience. They provide live-in cat sitters, dog walkers, and other pet services. They are committed to ensuring your peace of mind while you are away, and they have backup sitters available in case of an emergency.

Petstop London is a home-based pet care service in Cricklewood. They provide a personalised and reliable service all year round, with the goal of making sure your best friend is having the best time while you are away. They offer home boarding, walks, and pet visits.

The Pet Nanny London offers a professional and loving service for pet sitting, dog walking, and home boarding. They are a family-run business that is fully insured and licensed. They have been providing a safe and caring environment for pets since 2010.

Green Dog Walking provides professional, reliable and friendly dog walking and doggy day care services across London. They are known for their group walks in large green spaces like Hampstead Heath and their commitment to treating each dog as if it were their own.

Kensington Hounds is a leading dog walking and training company operating in the Royal Borough of Kensington and Chelsea. They specialise in fun, sociable off-leash group walks and offer a rewards-based, ethical training service for dogs and their owners.

H&H Dog offers professional and reliable dog walking services in North and North West London. They are endorsed by numerous veterinary surgeries and pride themselves on a personalised service that prioritizes the well-being of your dog. Their vans are climate-controlled for safe transport.

The Dogfather UK is an award-winning dog care company offering dog walking, boarding, and daycare in South West London. Their dedicated team transports dogs to the vast landscapes of Wimbledon Common, providing a proper one-hour walk in a natural and enriching environment. They are a 5-star licensed service.

The Woof Pack offers fun, structured and enriching pack walks for small and medium-sized dogs in Fulham, Putney, Battersea and Chelsea. Their walkers are trained and reliable, ensuring your dog gets a chance to socialise in a controlled environment. They also offer dog boarding and pet sitting services.

Hound Crew is a professional dog walking service that specialises in expert-led off-leash dog walks in Hackney and East London. They use GPS trackers on all dogs for safety and are fully insured and dog first aid trained. They pride themselves on making dogs happier and more confident.

We Love Pets Wimbledon is a team of trusted dog walkers and pet care professionals that are fully insured and DBS checked. They offer dog walking, dog sitting and pet sitting in Wimbledon and the surrounding areas. They never 'pack walk' dogs and focus on providing one-to-one or small group walks.

The Greenwich Dog Club offers a range of top-quality dog walking, daycare, and puppy training services. They are a small but dedicated team that is fully insured and DBS checked. They offer morning, lunch time and afternoon walks, and carefully match groups according to age, size, and temperament.

Paws Galore is a professional pet care service offering dog walking and pet sitting in London. They are a family-run business that is fully insured and all sitters are carefully vetted. They offer services for dogs, cats, and small animals.

Dave's Paws provides dog walking, doggy daycare and home boarding services in Clapham. They are known for their professional and caring approach, treating each dog like their own. They send regular photo and video updates of the dogs' adventures.
